metadata.feature_description: Configure Publisher module settings including display options, social sharing, and behavior

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module and enter Edit mode
steps.expected: Edit mode should be enabled and module settings accessible
steps.actual: Edit mode enabled successfully, module settings dialog accessible via Admin menu

steps.action: Open Module Settings dialog and navigate to Publisher Settings tab
steps.expected: Publisher Settings tab should be visible with TopTagsPageSize dropdown
steps.actual: Publisher Settings tab visible with TopTagsPageSize dropdown showing values 2, 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25

steps.expected: Dropdown should allow selection of value 10

steps.action: Open Module Settings dialog and change TopAuthorsPageSize from 5 to 15
steps.expected: Dropdown should allow selection of value 15
TopAuthorsPageSize should remain 15 after reopening settings

steps.action: Open Publisher Settings inline panel and view social sharing checkboxes
steps.expected: Social sharing checkboxes for Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, RSS should be visible
steps.actual: All 5 social sharing checkboxes visible with Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest enabled (checked) and RSS enabled

steps.action: Verify Pinterest button is hidden from the social sharing buttons area
steps.expected: Pinterest button should not be visible in the social buttons area
steps.actual: Pinterest button successfully hidden - only Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, RSS visible

steps.action: Open Publisher Settings panel and uncheck RSS checkbox
Save settings and verify RSS button is hidden
steps.expected: RSS feed button should not be visible in the social buttons area
steps.actual: RSS feed button successfully hidden - only Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn visible

steps.action: Open Publisher Settings panel and view workflow dropdown
steps.expected: Workflow dropdown should show available workflows
steps.actual: Workflow dropdown showing: Direct Publish (selected), Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow

steps.action: Change workflow from Direct Publish to Content Approval
steps.actual: Successfully changed workflow to Content Approval

steps.action: Save and verify workflow persisted after page reload
steps.expected: Content Approval should remain selected after page reload
steps.actual: Workflow setting persisted - Content Approval still selected after page reload

steps.action: Make multiple settings changes and save
steps.expected: All settings should be saved successfully
steps.actual: All settings changes (TopTagsPageSize, TopAuthorsPageSize, social sharing, workflow) saved successfully

steps.action: Verify settings persist after page reload
steps.actual: All settings persisted correctly after page reload

steps.action: Verify TopTagsPageSize dropdown has valid range values
steps.actual: Dropdown contains expected values: 2, 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25 as defined in ModuleSettings.ascx

steps.action: Verify TopAuthorsPageSize dropdown has valid range values
steps.actual: Dropdown contains expected values: 2, 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25 as defined in ModuleSettings.ascx

observations: The Publisher module has two separate settings interfaces: 1) Module Settings dialog accessed via Admin > Settings menu (contains TopTagsPageSize and TopAuthorsPageSize dropdowns), and 2) Publisher Settings inline panel accessed via gear icon at bottom of module (contains Workflow dropdown and social sharing checkboxes)
Code review shows default values: TopTagsPageSize=5, TopAuthorsPageSize=5, TwitterEnabled=true, FacebookEnabled=true, LinkedInEnabled=true, PinterestEnabled=true, RssEnabled=false

The suggested test scenarios for 'posts per page', 'default view mode (list/grid)', 'featured post count', and 'reset to default settings' do not have corresponding UI elements in the current Publisher module implementation. The module settings only expose TopTagsPageSize, TopAuthorsPageSize, social sharing toggles, RSS toggle, and workflow selection
